sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. enters agreement to increase stake in joint venture
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ:BTCT) has announced an agreement to increase its equity stake in a joint venture initially formed in 2022. The company, which operates in financial services outside the US and has previously traded under different names, disclosed the transaction in an SEC filing, though specific details like the purchase price and extent of the additional interest were not provided.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. enters agreement to increase stake in joint venture
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ:BTCT) has announced an agreement to acquire additional equity interests in a joint venture initially established in 2022. The finance services company, operating outside the United States, disclosed this transaction in an SEC filing, though specific details like the exact size of the stake or purchase price were not provided. This move signifies an expansion of their involvement in the existing joint venture.

feed.title: BTC Digital Boosts Stake in Crypto-Mining JV Met Chain to 44.53%
feed.summary: BTC Digital announced it has increased its indirect ownership in Met Chain Co., Limited, a crypto-mining hardware joint venture, from 29.53% to 44.53% through an additional 15% equity acquisition. The deal, valued at US$3.789 million and paid in BTC Digital ordinary shares, strengthens the company's control over a key asset while strategically managing pre-transfer liabilities. This move reinforces BTC Digital's presence in the cryptocurrency sector's hardware and infrastructure space.

feed.title: BTC Digital Reports Financial Losses Amidst Industry Challenges
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. announced significant financial losses for the six months ending June 30, 2025, with total assets decreasing from $41.13 million to $37.46 million. The company reported a gross loss of $1.314 million and an operating loss of $5.027 million, reflecting broader challenges within the digital finance sector. These figures highlight the impact of industry difficulties on the company's financial health and market position.

feed.title: BTC DIGITAL Earnings Preview: Recent $BTCT Insider Trading, Hedge Fund Activity, and More | BTCT Stock News
feed.summary: BTC DIGITAL ($BTCT) is set to release its quarterly earnings on Friday, November 14th, with analysts projecting $2,646,900 in revenue and $0.15 EPS. The article also details recent hedge fund activity, showing mixed sentiment with 3 institutional investors adding shares and 3 decreasing positions, including significant moves by UBS GROUP AG, SBI SECURITIES CO., LTD., and CITIGROUP INC.

feed.title: Bitcoin Miners Outperform BTC by 500% as AI Integration Redefines the Sector - The VR Soldier
feed.summary: Bitcoin miners have significantly outperformed BTC in 2025, with gains up to 500%, primarily due to the integration of AI and a shift towards hybrid computing models. This strategic change has stabilized miner revenue, reducing dependence on Bitcoin block rewards and easing selling pressure on BTC. Companies like Cipher Mining Inc. and IREN LTD are leading this transformation, expanding into AI infrastructure.

feed.title: BTC Digital and Tianci International Forge Strategic Blockchain Partnership - TipRanks
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. has formed a strategic partnership with Tianci International Inc. for blockchain services. The collaboration involves Tianci procuring $5 million in mining equipment and BTC Digital providing hosting and maintenance, aiming to expand BTC Digital's presence in the digital asset ecosystem.

feed.title: Certain Ordinary Shares of BTC Digital Ltd. are subject to a Lock-Up Agreement Ending on 15-OCT-2025. - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Certain ordinary shares of BTC Digital Ltd. are subject to a lock-up agreement that will end on October 15, 2025. These shares will be under a 91-day lock-up period from July 16, 2025, to October 15, 2025, affecting directors, officers, and holders of 10% of outstanding ordinary shares.

feed.title: Tianci International Announces MOU with BTC Digital
feed.summary: Tianci International announced a Memorandum of Understanding with BTC Digital to integrate blockchain technology into its logistics operations. The collaboration includes purchasing cryptocurrency mining machines and exploring stablecoin-based payment systems and tokenizing real-world assets. Tianci International is a global logistics service provider operating under an asset-light model.

feed.title: BTC Digital signs $5 million mining equipment deal with Tianci By Investing.com - Investing.com South Africa
feed.summary: This article reports that BTC Digital has signed a $5 million deal with Tianci for mining equipment. However, the article content provided is incomplete and only displays an application error message, preventing the extraction of further details about the deal.

feed.title: Tianci International, Inc. Reports Entry Into Memorandum of Understanding with BTC Digital Ltd. - ACCESS Newswire
feed.summary: Tianci International, Inc., a global logistics service provider, has entered into a non-binding Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with BTC Digital Ltd. The MOU outlines a strategic cooperative relationship where Tianci will explore cryptocurrency and blockchain applications to enhance its logistics operations. This includes potentially purchasing $5 million worth of cryptocurrency mining machines from BTC Digital, engaging them for hosting and maintenance, and collaborating on stablecoin and Real World Asset tokenization.

feed.title: Btc digital signs MoU with Tianci International to deliver infrastructure, operations and blockchain services - MarketScreener
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Tianci International to provide infrastructure, operations, and blockchain services. This collaboration aims to leverage their combined expertise in the blockchain sector. The article also provides recent financial news and stock performance data for BTC Digital Ltd.

feed.title: BTC Digital Signs MOU with Tianci International to Deliver Infrastructure, Operations and Blockchain Services - MarketScreener
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) announced a strategic Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Tianci International Inc. (CIIT) for broad cooperation in cryptocurrency mining, stablecoin solutions, real-world asset initiatives, and blockchain technology services. Under the MOU, CIIT will procure $5.0 million in crypto mining equipment, with BTCT providing full hosting, operations, and maintenance. The companies will also jointly explore blockchain applications for payments, RWA, supply chain, and financial settlements.

feed.title: BTC Digital Signs MOU With Tianci International to Deliver Infrastructure, Operations and Blockchain Services - 富途牛牛
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) and Tianci International Inc. (CIIT) have signed an MOU for a broad strategic cooperation in cryptocurrency mining, stablecoin-based payment solutions, real-world asset initiatives, and blockchain technology services. CIIT plans to invest approximately $5.0 million in crypto mining equipment, with BTCT providing hosting and operational services. The companies will also collaborate on developing payment and settlement use cases and supporting CIIT's digital transformation with blockchain solutions.

feed.title: $5.0M Mining Procurement: BTC Digital & Tianci Intl. MOU to Provide Hosting, Stablecoin & RWA Solutions - Stock Titan
feed.summary: BTC Digital (NASDAQ: BTCT) signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Tianci International (NASDAQ: CIIT) to collaborate on cryptocurrency mining, stablecoin payments, real-world asset initiatives, and blockchain services. Under the MOU, CIIT plans to procure approximately US$5.0 million of mining equipment, with BTCT providing hosting, operations, and maintenance. The companies will also explore stablecoin settlement use cases and blockchain solutions for various business functions.

feed.title: Forget MSTR, These 3 Bitcoin-Linked Stocks Are Flashing Valuation Red Flags - Benzinga
feed.summary: Three Bitcoin-linked stocks, Bit Digital Inc., HIVE Digital Technologies Ltd., and CleanSpark Inc., are signaling overvaluation to investors, according to Benzinga's value percentile rankings. These companies have seen notable declines in their value percentile, indicating that their market prices have moved further above intrinsic value benchmarks. Investors are cautioned to consider these "red flags" for potential portfolio adjustments.

feed.title: 3 Bitcoin Treasury Firms Show Improving Price Trends, Strong Momentum Signals
feed.summary: Three Bitcoin treasury firms, MARA Holdings Inc. (MARA), Rumble Inc. (RUM), and BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT), have demonstrated significant improvements in their momentum rankings, indicating positive price trends and growing investor confidence. MARA and Rumble are leveraging Bitcoin in their strategies, while BTC Digital has pivoted to Ethereum-based models. These shifts suggest potential for short-term price appreciation for these stocks.

feed.title: BTC Digital Delays Critical Shareholder Meeting as Urgent Vote Needed by August 4
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ: BTCT) has adjourned its extraordinary general meeting from July 21, 2025, to August 4, 2025, due to a lack of quorum. The company urges shareholders to vote on critical proposals outlined in the proxy statement, as previously cast votes remain valid. Advantage Proxy, Inc. has been engaged to assist with proxy solicitation, and only shareholders of record as of June 27, 2025, are eligible to vote.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) Stock: Dips 2.31% Amid Major Shift from Bitcoin to Ethereum
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) saw its stock dip 2.31% after announcing a major strategic shift from Bitcoin to Ethereum. The company plans to convert all Bitcoin holdings to Ethereum, aiming to leverage Ethereum's ecosystem for staking, DeFi, and RWA participation, with a target of tens of millions in ETH reserves by year-end. This move positions BTCT as an active value generator within the on-chain financial system rather than a passive reserve holder.

feed.title: BTC Digital closes $6 million registered direct offering
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ:BTCT) has successfully closed a registered direct offering, raising $6 million by selling 2 million ordinary shares to institutional investors at $3.00 per share. The company intends to use these proceeds, coupled with existing cash, to acquire Ethereum, furthering its strategy to increase cryptocurrency holdings. Additionally, BTC Digital is advancing its cryptocurrency mining projects and shifting towards on-chain financial infrastructure, with plans to expand its total crypto reserves to over $10 million by the end of 2025.

feed.title: BTC Digital Raises $6M from Institutions to Expand Ethereum Holdings
feed.summary: BTC Digital has successfully closed a $6.0 million registered direct offering, selling 2,000,000 Ordinary Shares at $3.00 per share to institutional investors. The company intends to use the net proceeds, combined with existing cash, to purchase Ethereum, signaling a strategic investment in the cryptocurrency. Aegis Capital Corp. served as the exclusive placement agent for the offering, which closed on July 16, 2025.

feed.title: BTC Digital Raises $6M from Institutions: Plans Strategic Ethereum Investment Move
feed.summary: BTC Digital (NASDAQ: BTCT) has announced a $6.0 million registered direct offering with institutional investors, selling 2,000,000 Ordinary Shares at $3.00 per share. The company intends to use the net proceeds, combined with existing cash, specifically for the purchase of Ethereum. Aegis Capital Corp. is serving as the exclusive placement agent for this offering, which is expected to close around July 16, 2025.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. Announces $6 Million Share Offering to Boost Blockchain Ventures
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. announced a $6.0 million private placement of ordinary shares to institutional investors at $3.00 per share, which is expected to close on July 16, 2025. The proceeds from this offering are intended for the purchase of Ethereum, furthering BTC Digital's strategic initiatives within the blockchain industry. The company focuses on blockchain technology, metaverse, and cryptocurrency mining in North America.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) Stock Surges 13% as Company Unveils $1M Ethereum Reserve Strategy
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (BTCT) saw its stock surge by 13% after announcing a new $1 million Ethereum reserve strategy, signaling a major shift from its traditional crypto mining operations. The company is now focusing on integrating into Ethereum's financial infrastructure and smart contract ecosystem, driven by the platform's stablecoin dominance and staking trends. This pivot aims to leverage Ethereum's utility for stablecoin issuance and asset tokenization, positioning BTCT as a key participant in on-chain finance.

feed.title: BTC Digital Surges To 2-Year Highs On Institutional Interest In Autozi, New Mining Deals: Retail Divided
feed.summary: Shares of BTC Digital (BTCT) surged over 14% to two-year highs following increased institutional interest in Autozi Internet Technology (AZI) and new Bitcoin mining hosting agreements. The company has gained significantly in 2024, outpacing Bitcoin's rise, but retail investors are divided on its future trajectory. The rally is attributed to institutional interest, new mining deals, and possibly market speculation around broader trends.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. Announces Exercise of Over-Allotment Option in Public Offering
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. announced that the underwriter of its public offering has exercised its over-allotment option to purchase an additional 228,853 Ordinary Shares at $8.00 per share, generating an additional $1.8 million in gross proceeds. This exercise increases the total shares sold to 1,108,853 and gross proceeds to approximately $8.8 million. The closing of this option exercise is expected on December 12, 2024.

feed.title: Wall Street Bitcoin Miner BTC Digital Deploys 2,000 BITMAIN T21 Miners
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ: BTCT) is deploying 2,000 BITMAIN T21 miners to its North American facilities within the next 3–6 months, significantly increasing its hash rate capacity to 600 petahashes. This strategic deployment aims to improve mining efficiency and strengthen the company's position in the cryptocurrency market. Additionally, BTCT plans to expand its operations into Arkansas, Tennessee, Georgia, and Missouri, focusing on reliable, long-term energy supplies, including renewables.

feed.title: Chinese Bitcoin miner looking to the American south for sustainable mining options
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. (NASDAQ: BTCT), a Chinese Bitcoin miner, plans to expand its operations into Arkansas, Tennessee, Georgia, and Missouri to scale hashrate and mining facilities. The company aims to secure reliable, long-term energy supplies, including renewable sources, recognizing the Southeastern United States for its abundant energy resources and business-friendly environment. This expansion aligns with global sustainability goals, with BTCT seeking to optimize resource allocation, improve operational efficiency, and contribute to regional economic growth.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. Announces Acquisition of Mining Facility in North Carolina
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. has announced the acquisition of a Bitcoin mining facility in North Carolina for $3.4 million, featuring a stable power load of 10 megavolts. This strategic move aims to reduce operational costs, secure a long-term stable energy supply, and enable the company to offer leading mining rig hosting services, thereby strengthening its position in the digital currency mining industry. The acquisition is a crucial step in the company's strategic development and response to future industry trends.

feed.title: BTC Digital Ltd. to Change Ticker Symbol to "BTCT" on September 29, 2023
feed.summary: BTC Digital Ltd. announced that its ordinary shares and warrants will change ticker symbols on the Nasdaq Stock Market to "BTCT" and "BTCTW" respectively, effective September 29, 2023. These new symbols align with the company's recent name change from Meten Holding Group Ltd. to BTC Digital Ltd. No action from shareholders is required, and the company's CUSIP numbers will remain unchanged.
